-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://github.com/pgadmin-org/pgadmin4/issues/new/choose if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.postingan
(
    content text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    create_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    id_postingan serial NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT postingan_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id_postingan)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."user"
(
    username character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    email character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    password character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    create_at timestamp with time zone,
    id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('user_server_id_seq'::regclass),
    CONSTRAINT user_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.postingan
    ADD CONSTRAINT id_postingan FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public."user" (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
